a.detail:
Net Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or become restrained

c.detail: Someone has scrawled "straight, door, door" here

i.detail:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 cold damage

details.history: The dungeon was created by elves as a lair. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 20 to find) Locked Strong Wooden Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 25 to break; 20 hp)
detail.room_features: A magical pool in the south-east corner of the room petrifies whomever drinks from it, and someone has scrawled a basic map of the dungeon on the west wall

1500 cp, 800 sp, 90 gp, a bone comb engraved with a labyrinth (25 gp), a leather armor trimmed with rabbit fur (25 gp), a marble brazier inlaid with ornate copper scrollwork (25 gp), a necklace of malachite (25 gp), a petrified squirrel engraved with arcane runes (25 gp), a pewter ring brooch set with amber (25 gp), an agateware tile embossed with draconic runes (25 gp), Cap of Water Breathing (uncommon, dmg 157), Dust of Disappearance (uncommon, dmg 166), Potion of Water Breathing (uncommon, dmg 188), Saddle of the Cavalier (uncommon, dmg 199)
